name: About
content: Nestled in the southwest corner of charming downtown Canmore
column3: crust & crumb offers a wide selection of baked fresh daily breads and pastries. The bakery features sourdough leavened loaves and a variety of weekly baker's choice specials. crust & crumb partners with local producers to source the freshest and highest quality milled grains

name: Contact
content: We love to here from you.
